question: Which drone became the first defense hardware to be procured on lease under the new Defense Acquisition Procedure 2020?
explanation: Indian Navy inducted two ‘MQ-9B Sea Guardian’ unarmed drones procured from the U.S. on lease. MQ-9B Sea Guardian became the first defense hardware to be procured on lease under the new Defense Acquisition Procedure 2020. The drones have been leased for a period of one year to check the surveillance in the Indian Ocean Region.
